messages.title: OUR WIMBLEDON CANDIDATE
messages.content: I and my late wife happily raised 4 children in Wimbledon but local services are being reduced particularly for the elderly, the poor and the less privileged. The Green Party stands for the common good. We are not controlled by lobbyists.

The core values of the Green Party are relevant here. Our environment is being damaged. Road traffic is causing more and more air pollution and the care of many of our open spaces is being privatised so volunteers will be working for a private company's profits.
We believe in a right to education without incurring debt, to health without profiteering and to a compassionate and equal society.

messages.title: VOTE FOR THE COMMON GOOD ON 7TH MAY

issues.education: We believe in a right to education without incurring debt.
